features: 💡【Touch Control with 3 Brightness Levels】 Its 360-degree touch base allows you to adjust 3 brightness level via gentle touch or tap, low lighting at 10% brightness perfect for bedside use, medium lighting at 70 % brightness for general daily usage and the high light with 100 % brightness for reading purposes. Touch-sensitive bedside lamps have been a bit of a revelation, no more fumbling around in the dark trying to find a tiny switch, just reach out, touch the lamp and on it comes.

💡【Juice Up Your Devices with Built-in USB Ports & Power Outlet】Dual inbuilt 5V/2A USB port designed at the base that facilitates the convenient fast charging of devices, including mobile phones, tablets, laptops, etc. Additionally, bedside lamps are equipped with Power Outlets for extra convenient charging. It means you could charge up to three devices at the same time. Charging function works whether lamps on or off.

💡【Free LED Bulb Included】The touch control table lamp include Daylight White LED bulbs in the package so you don’t have to purchase it additionally. Also LED is the way to save electric which only cost 7W energy while bright as 60W incandescent bulbs. No buzzing sound to interrupt your work or sleep.

💡【Elegant Modern Lamp Deco & Best Gift】 Its outstanding sleek design gives a simple but elegant appealing look with a shiny stainless steel curving sides. When coupled with the white linen shade, the table lamp well blend in any type of interior decors, be it minimalist, contemporary, modern, traditional, mid-century, urban, etc.

💡【High Quality & Easy Assembly】 The package comes with table lamps that is 17 inches overall height and 6 inches wide around the base. It comes with a shade measuring 8 inches wide. The lamp is constructed with steel for durability and the weighted base for stability so you won’t have to worry about knocking them off the table during the night. In addition to this, the lamp comes with 45-day money back guarantee and a 24-month warranty.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 3-Way Touch Lamp with USB Charging Ports and Power Outlet Are you tired of fumbling around trying to find a switch at night? Do you want to get up early but not waking up your partner? Is your house or bedroom short of wall outlets? If one of the above questions troubled you, then spend a few minutes to look at our table lamp will be a great deal for you! Our table lamp is touch controlled by a simple tap on the lamp base or pole to turn on/off, or adjust the brightness from low light, medium light and high light. The lamp base designed with charging ability with built-in USB Ports and AC Outlet for more convenience. It is a multi-functional table lamp practical and easy to use in your life!!

Tap to Turn On and Tap It More for Brightness Easy Touch Feature The lamp is easy to control and sensitive to touch by either tapping the base or touching the lamp post. 3 Level of Brightness The bedside lamp compatible with 3 setting brightness for different uses： low light is very dim for nursery as a night lightmedium light for reading book or spot lightinghigh light for filling your room with light.

Plus bonus 2 USB Charging Ports Handy built-in Dual 5V/2.1A Fast Charging USB Ports have your iPhone, iPad, alarm clock, smartwatch, Kindle, etc., charged while in bed or sleep overnight. Saving time to dig out an extension cord and keeps your table organized. Great Addition with Electric Outlet Power Outlet(120V) also offers ways to plug-in different Devices that need to be charged nearby, easy access for today's electric world. Free up your outlets and save time to crawling around looking for sockets on floor. Daylight White LED BUlb Included Comes with a 5000K Daylight White LED bulb for free in the package so you don’t have to purchase it additionally. Also LED is the way to save electric which only cost 7W energy while bright as 60W incandescent bulbs. No buzzing or humming sound to interrupt your work or sleep. No ﬂickering and eliminating eyes exhaustion to protect Your Eyes! Marvolous Gift Ideas! It is a fabulous gift for all ages from newborns to the elderly. Not only its convenienct reach over touch performance, but also its handy charging ability makes this touch table lamp a practical device in your life.
Desk Lamp / Office Lamp Reading Lamp Lamp for Living Room Nightstand Lamp / Nursery Lamp

WOW! I am so Impressed by this excellent Lamp! It won't be wrong to have one! FAQ: 1. Do the USB ports work if the light is turned off? Yes, the USB charging port functions regardless of whether the lamp is on or off as long as it is plugged into the wall. 2. How can I do if the bulb not working or have any problem? We will replacement bulb in the fastest and most convenient way. Also please prevent the bulb from grease, water or other liquids. 3. Does the "touch control" turn the lamp off? Yes, this touch table lamp has 4 brightness levels (Off, Low, Medium, High) that are practical for every need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update: Company reached to me. Problem solved!
reviews.reviewText: Update: 7.17.21. The company reached out to me and offered to send me another lamp . . . and did so, in an expedited fashion. Had issues with the light flickering. Got the new lamp. Works like a charm.-------------------------------------------------------------Pros: Small size. Doesn't take up too much space on your lampstand/table. USB plugs are a nice addition. $$$ is reasonable.Cons: Minor detail. Just a note, if this light is plugged into a switchable out let (open bedroom door, turn on the light switch), it won't turn on. But, in fairness, it's not designed to do this. This is a touch sensor light. On the flip side, you can turn it on/off while in bed without having to get up to turn on/off the light . . . also, without having to locate the on/off switch. Touch the lamp pole or base anywhere to control the light.Bottom line?? This is a great light for your bedside table. The USB ports allow you do do away with not only using up a charger (2 USB ports, BTW), but trying to find a place for it. The size is small, but perfect because it does not occupy a lot of table top real estate, both in foot print and the lamp shade. Also, customer service will solve any issues. The light bulb is a 3 way, so "Off, Low, Medium, High, Off".

This was exactly what we were looking for and excellent quality. Unfortunately one of the two we ordered had a broken shade because the box it came in was crushed during delivery. The vendor was great to deal with and promptly agreed to send us a new one at no charge. Overall very happy with purchase.
